channel.title: InYourBones Daily Music News
channel.description: Top 5 daily music stories handpicked by InYourBones

item.title: Ed Sheeran Announces 2026 Australian & New Zealand Loop Tour Dates
item.description: 🎶 Down under, get ready for Ed Sheeran's Loop Tour in 2026! Who's excited to dance with the Aussie and Kiwi vibes? 🇦🇺🇳🇿 #EdDownUnder

item.title: Stevie Wonder Says He’ll Never Give Up Performing: ‘You Don’t Have to Retire’
item.description: 🌟🎶 Stevie Wonder keeping the music alive and kicking! Who else is ready for more iconic performances? 🎤✨ #StevieWonder #MusicLegend

item.title: Tool Announce First Hawaii Show in Nearly 15 Years
item.description: 🌴 Aloha, Hawaii! Tool is bringing the rock back to the islands after 15 years! Who's ready to jam? 🎸 #ToolInHawaii

item.title: Metallica Scholars Initiative Commits $3 Million to Workforce Education
item.description: 🎸📚 Metallica rocks on with $3 million for workforce education! Keep headbanging and learning! 🤘🤓 #MetallicaScholars #EducationRockstars

item.title: ABBA’s “Gimme, Gimme, Gimme (A Man After Midnight)” Hits 1 Billion Streams on Spotify
item.description: ABBA knows how to slay! 🎶💃 Celebrating 1 billion streams for "Gimme, Gimme, Gimme" on Spotify! Time to dance! #ABBA #BillionStreams
